root: ^This is Dan, the hero man. Find the cure, save the village, that's the plan!
^"Good morning!" Says greg, he's the neighbor you hate.

c-0: ^You've leveled up on your way out the door, by kicking Greg, who could ask for more?
c-1: ^You ignore your neighbor (Greg, who you hate), and you trip him as you head out the front gate.
g-0: ^Grab a drink at the pub, then it's off on your way! But should you take precious time to search the town, anyway?
^You can never be too careful, or so they say
^No time to lose, especially not today!

c-2: ^"Sir, I have a trade!" Said a little begger boy. 1 piece of copper for a strange looking toy.
^"Not a toy, but a key! To save the world, collect all three!"
^Make the trade, (and steal his hat) then off to the bar, just like that.
c-3: ^You’re not a detective, you’re a hero, you’re a man! You run straight through town as fast as you can.

g-1: ^Your Suave funny charm has caused a bar fight. Face the Burley gents, come on, test your might!
^"You are clearly superior!" Says the leader, dejected.
^"You may come with me, I need protection!"
